declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @join nvarchar(1023), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int, @luong_nn tinyint, @n int
select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0 select @luong_nn = cast(val as int) from options where name = 'm_si_loai_nn' select @n = cast(val as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien_luong'
-- Checking &Checking;
&EndErrorMode;
-- if @luong_nn = 2 begin update @@table set luong_cb = case when luong_cb = 0 then round((luong + phu_cap_lg + phu_cap_khac), @n) else luong_cb end, luong_cb0 = case when luong_cb0 = 0 then round((luong0 + phu_cap_lg0 + phu_cap_khac0), @n) else luong_cb0 end where luong_cb = 0 or luong_cb0 = 0
update @@table set hs_luong_cb0 = 0, hs_luong_cb = 0, phu_cap_cv0 = 0, phu_cap_cv = 0, phu_cap_vuot0 = 0, phu_cap_vuot = 0, phu_cap_tn0 = 0, phu_cap_tn = 0, phu_cap_kv0 = 0, phu_cap_kv = 0 end else begin update @@table set luong_cb = case when a.luong_cb = 0 then round((hs_luong_cb + phu_cap_cv + (phu_cap_vuot / 100) + (phu_cap_tn / 100) + phu_cap_kv) * b.luong_tt, @n) else a.luong_cb end, luong_cb0 = case when a.luong_cb0 = 0 then round((hs_luong_cb0 + phu_cap_cv0 + (phu_cap_vuot0 / 100) + (phu_cap_tn0 / 100) + phu_cap_kv0) * b.luong_tt, @n) else a.luong_cb0 end from @@table a join hrdmlttc b on b.ngay_hl = (select max(ngay_hl) as ngay_hl from hrdmlttc where ngay_hl <= a.ngay_thay_doi) where a.luong_cb = 0 or a.luong_cb0 = 0
update @@table set luong0 = 0, luong = 0, phu_cap_lg0 = 0, phu_cap_lg = 0, phu_cap_khac0 = 0, phu_cap_khac = 0 end update @@table set tl_xh_giam = 0, tl_yt_giam = 0, tl_tn_giam = 0 from @@table z where exists (select 1 from hrdmltdbh a join hrdmktdbh b on a.loai_td = b.ma_kieu where a.ma_loai = z.loai_thay_doi and b.tinh_chat <> 2) update @@table set tl_xh_tang = 0, tl_yt_tang = 0, tl_tn_tang = 0 from @@table z where exists (select 1 from hrdmltdbh a join hrdmktdbh b on a.loai_td = b.ma_kieu where a.ma_loai = z.loai_thay_doi and b.tinh_chat <> 1) update @@table set ky_sau_yn = 0 from @@table z where exists (select 1 from hrdmltdbh a where a.ma_loai = z.loai_thay_doi and a.tinh_chat <> 3)
if @admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrInsuranceInformationChangesInput', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, dot, ngay_thay_doi, loai_thay_doi, tra_bhyt, ngay_tu, ngay_den, hs_luong_cb0, hs_luong_cb, phu_cap_cv0, phu_cap_cv, phu_cap_vuot0, phu_cap_vuot, phu_cap_tn0, phu_cap_tn, phu_cap_kv0, phu_cap_kv, luong0, luong, phu_cap_lg0, phu_cap_lg, phu_cap_khac0, phu_cap_khac, luong_cb0, luong_cb, tl_xh_tang, tl_xh_giam, tl_yt_tang, tl_yt_giam, tl_tn_tang, tl_tn_giam, ky_sau_yn, muc_dong_xh0,muc_dong_yt0, muc_dong_tn0, tt_cu, tt_moi, ghi_chu, loai_trich, tinh_trang, ngay_bd_dong, ngay_kt_dong, ngay_bd_cvdh, ngay_kt_cvdh into #r from hrbhdstg
set @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.dot, a.ngay_thay_doi, a.loai_thay_doi, a.tra_bhyt , a.ngay_tu, a.ngay_den, a.hs_luong_cb0, ' set @q = @q + 'a.hs_luong_cb, a.phu_cap_cv0, a.phu_cap_cv , a.phu_cap_vuot0, a.phu_cap_vuot, a.phu_cap_tn0, a.phu_cap_tn, a.phu_cap_kv0, a.phu_cap_kv, ' set @q = @q + 'a.luong0, a.luong, a.phu_cap_lg0, a.phu_cap_lg, a.phu_cap_khac0, a.phu_cap_khac, a.luong_cb0, a.luong_cb, a.tl_xh_tang, ' set @q = @q + 'a.tl_xh_giam, a.tl_yt_tang, a.tl_yt_giam, a.tl_tn_tang, a.tl_tn_giam, a.ky_sau_yn, a.muc_dong_xh0, a.muc_dong_yt0, a.muc_dong_tn0, a.tt_cu, a.tt_moi, a.ghi_chu, a.loai_trich, a.tinh_trang, ' set @q = @q + 'a.ngay_bd_dong, a.ngay_kt_dong, a.ngay_bd_cvdh, a.ngay_kt_cvdh' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrbhdstg b where b.nam = @nam and b.ky = @thang and a.dot = b.dot and a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_thay_doi = b.loai_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi) select a.* into #k from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrbhdstg b where b.nam = @nam and b.ky = @thang and a.dot = b.dot and a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_thay_doi = b.loai_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi) delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.dot = b.dot and a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_thay_doi = b.loai_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi)
-- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrbhdstg set @@list from hrbhdstg a join #k b on a.nam = @nam and a.ky = @thang and a.dot = b.dot and a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.loai_thay_doi = b.loai_thay_doi and a.ngay_thay_doi = b.ngay_thay_doi end
